prompts.prompt: Create a web job media platform as shown in the photos. The first photo is the TOP page with clickable job tiles that transition to the second photo, which is the job listing.
求人票のタイルは、横長で、縦に並べて。

Create a job tile component like the one in the photo. It should include a picture, job type (long-term intern, short-term intern, others), job title in uppercase, company logo, company name, and a bookmark icon.
Increase the size of the job listing tile. The width should be about half the width of the web screen, and the height should be half the size of the width.
Create a job media platform with a UI and specifications similar to the site at https://protocol.ooo/jobs.
Create a job media platform with a UI and specifications similar to the site at https://cenaka-intern.com/internship-post.
